articles.title: Austrian Grand Prix results confirmed as Sainz and Hamilton among drivers demoted - Formula 1
articles.description: The FIA has released a final classification of results for the Austrian Grand Prix after a string of retrospective penalties for track limit infringements were handed down. Carlos Sainz and Lewis Hamilton are two of the drivers to be demoted in the new standi…

articles.author: Omar Garrick
articles.title: Liverpool sign Dominik Szoboszlai from RB Leipzig - The Athletic
articles.description:
Liverpool have completed the signing of Dominik Szoboszlai from RB Leipzig.
The Hungarian attacking midfielder has signed a five-year deal after the Anfield club triggered his £60million release clause with the Bundesliga club.
